full_threads.body:
Hi Tien,

Thank you so much for letting us know.

We’ve had a look and can confirm that the plugin is still functioning properly.

That said, just a quick heads-up, future updates may require license renewals to keep things running smoothly.

As the licenses aren’t managed through our system, these will need to be renewed directly by your team when the time comes. We’ll always do our best to give you a heads-up if we spot any issues related to them.

Let us know if you have any questions, we’re always happy to help.

action.text: Victoria Victoria assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Thank you.

I agree the customer will need to cover this. Please provide a recommendation on best path (maybe speak to JM about history learnings).

My preference would be for them to purchase.

Hey @andy - AB and JM looked deeper into the site and looks like they need all 9 plugins (see table above), also note that we did not develop their website

We think it's expensive (~$1k) given that there are 9 plugins and we couldn't prio one.

We have 2 paths:
  • Let the client know about it, and have them pay for it themselves
  • Let the client know about it, once approved we'll get the licenses and have them pay for it

Can you please check the draft above if we're in the right path?

Thanks!

full_threads.body:
Hey @allieB thanks for this.

Pricing indicated are in USD so around ~$77 AUD and an introductory pricing, all renewals are at full price.

USD99 = ~$155 AUD

A little bit expensive, @daphne - can you confirm this? Thanks!

@victoriaV - how much should we charge them or do we have an extra charge?

I think basic plan is good for them - $49.50

full_threads.body: HI @allieB they don't but they're under a Pro Plan, thanks!
Hey @victoriaV - can you confirm, if they pay for a WPForms plugin 🙏 in their plans

Hi @allieB

Hi [Name],

I wanted to let you know that the WPForms license on your website has already expired. This means the plugin is no longer receiving security updates, feature upgrades, or official support, which could eventually affect performance and compatibility.

Please check the image below and confirm if you’d like me to proceed with the renewal. Once confirmed, we will request the updated license key so we can complete the renewal and ensure everything is running smoothly.

Looking forward to your confirmation.

Best regards,
